title: MPCB alleges non-compliance with environmental standards by Mercedes-Benz India
description: The Maharashtra Pollution Control Board (MPCB) found Mercedes-Benz India's Pune plant violating environmental guidelines. An inspection revealed non-compliance, leading to the forfeiture of Mercedes-Benz's bank guarantee of Rs 25 lakh. The company denied receiving formal notice but pledged to work with authorities and implement necessary corrective actions.
